page.title: 04Social Concern in Twyford
page.content: The acceleration in changing village life in the 1980's is giving rise for cncern in two main ways: 1a.Increasing congestion within Twyford village boundary by house infill of every available site with a road access. b. Extension of village houses especially small older houses sold when elderly residents die or leave. c. Congestion caused by vehicles parked on the roads. 2.Break up of family life as follows: a.Break up of marriages. b.Teenagers leaving the family to find work. c.Extended family split i.e. elderly relatives left when family move to improved employment prospects. Recently the Parish Church needed repair.The whole village rallied to help and raised over 12,000.
